item.title: IT Telegram Channels
item.description: There are some useful IT Telegram Channels https://t.me/rxd_txd - rxd_txd https://t.me/Social_engineering - Social Engineering https://t.me/geekexport - GEEK EXPORT https://t.me/docops - DocOps https://t.me/refactor_later - Потом отрефакторим https://t.me/golanglibrary - Go Library https://t.me/devopslibrary - DevOps&SRE Library https://t.me/gophernews - 4gophers https://t.me/generictalks - Generic Talks https://t.me/go_perf - Go performance channel https://t.me/goproglib - Библиотека Go разработчика https://t.me/PINE64_News - PINE64 News https://t.me/SysadminNotes - Записки админа https://t.me/microservices_arch - Микросервисы https://t.me/meta_it - Свалка ссылок на чаты и каналы о IT.
